## Larvae and YOY indicators

### Recruitment
```{r, recruit}
test <- stock %>%
  dplyr::filter(Metric == "Recruitment") %>%
  dplyr::rename(
    Var = Metric,
    Val = Value
  ) %>%
  dplyr::select(Time, Val, Var)
names <- names[-1]
```

```{r, print, results = "markup"}
print(head(test))
names <- names[-1]
```

```{r, recruit2}
names[1] <- "recruit"

if (nrow(test) > params$lag) {
  tst <- try(NEesp::render_indicator(test, lab = names[1]))
  if(class(tst) == "try-error"){
    names <- names[-1]
  }
} else {
  names <- names[-1]
  print("No data")
}

names <- names[-1]
```
